title: Wild West (2002 - 2004) complete series
description:
Wild West complete series 1 + 2 (2002 - 2004)

Wild West is a situation comedy screened from October 2002 until 2004 (12 episodes) starring Dawn French and Catherine Tate. It was described as a dark comedy from the pen of Simon Nye and was filmed on location in Cornwall. Set in the hamlet of St Gweep, Wild West observes the strange goings-on in the local Cornish community. Shop owners Mary Trewednack and her life-partner Angela are the main focus but there are many other characters in this sitcom.

The first series of the sitcom was scheduled to appear on prime-time BBC1 where its eccentricities met with a poor critical and popular response, but a second series was commissioned and both series have received retrospective praise."Wild West" had some very black humour and dark characters, so was never meant to appeal to the masses - it's definitely one of those you either love or hate. 

Most of the sitcom was filmed in the village of Portloe in Cornwall.

Stars - Dawn French, Catherine Tate, Anne-Marie Duff, David Bradley, Sean Foley

Series 1  (6 x 30 minute episodes)

  episode 1 - One Home Good, Two Homes Bad 
  episode 2 - Fear Of Bungee
  episode 3 - Swingers
  episode 4 - Tin, Tin, Tin
  episode 5 - A Problem Shared Is A Problem Doubled
  episode 6 - Un, Deu, Try, Figo, Quiggly

Series 2  (6 x 30 minute episodes)

  episode 1 - The Exploding Car
  episode 2 - Magical Horses
  episode 3 - Angela Learns to Drive
  episode 4 - Cornish Flu
  episode 5 - The Film Crew
  episode 6 - Holly Loses Faith in Witchcraft
